title: Refactor - Update basepoint logic
comment: Update the basepoint logic to leverage ifcopenshell geometry settings model-offset instead of manual shift in the usd authoring phase.\n\nThe manual shift logic should be maintained with auto/manual flag introduced to drive the geo-anchoring behaviour. When auto, the process should take the model-offset approach with no usd stage manual shift. Manual performs usd side manual shifting - useful for conversions via omniverser conver. The api should be exposed o downstream processes

title: Refactor - Update Anchor Mode Logic
comment: Update the anchor mode logic to now respect geolocation flag (Manual vs author) Depending on which it either feeds the correct anchor mode values either to settings model offset or manually shift at stage authroing.

title: Refactor - Update Geometry Settings logic
comment: Develope a geometry settings class and related methods that dispaches base settings, detail mode (occ based settings) and detail mode (re-mesh settings)
additional: Update processing logic to reflect changes.
